### Details

We'll start with a Letter Number substitution cipher.

Hint: take each test case one at a time.

### Acceptance Criteria

```ruby
encrypt('a', 3) #=> '4'
encrypt('a', 10) #=> '11'
encrypt('b', 3) #=> '5'
encrypt('abc', 3) #=> '456'
encrypt('a cab', 3) #=> '43645'
```
